messages.msgSnippet: Thank you for the email. I am currently researching for my second book based on the Koryu. Do you know of anyone that can guide me to the best site please?
messages.messageBody:
Thank you for the email. I am currently researching for my second book based
on the Koryu. Do you know of anyone that can guide me to the best site
please?

Regards


Neil Horton

messages.messageBody:

> Hey everyone,
> I finally got to see the shogun edition of warriors on Discovery
> last night, and I thought it was pretty good. As historically

messages.subject: Warriors Tv Show
messages.msgSnippet: Hey everyone,    I finally got to see the shogun edition of warriors on Discovery last night, and I thought it was pretty good. As historically inaccurate as
messages.messageBody:
Hey everyone,
   I finally got to see the shogun edition of warriors on Discovery last night, and I thought it was pretty good. As historically inaccurate as the ninja scene was (correct me if I'm wrong), I thought that it was even pretty good. What are your all's thoughts on it?




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
